weekly_top_story.headline: FDA Approves First-of-Its-Kind Alzheimer's Drug
weekly_top_story.summary: The FDA's approval of lecanemab marks a significant advancement in Alzheimer's treatment, offering a potential disease-modifying therapy and changing the landscape of dementia care.

stories.headline: New CDC Data Shows Increase in Flu Cases
stories.summary: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) reported a surge in influenza cases, highlighting the importance of vaccination and preventative measures during the current flu season.

stories.headline: Hospital Staffing Shortages Continue to Worsen
stories.summary: A new report indicates that the ongoing nursing shortage is exacerbating hospital capacity issues and impacting patient care across the nation.

stories.headline: AI-Powered Diagnostic Tool Shows Promise in Early Cancer Detection
stories.summary: Researchers unveiled a new AI-powered diagnostic tool that demonstrates significantly improved accuracy in detecting various types of cancer at earlier stages, potentially revolutionizing early diagnosis and treatment.
